      • sample

        public abstract double sample()
                       throws ILPException,
                              SolveException,
                              ReadOrWriteToFileException,
                              SQLException,
                              ParseException
        This method performs the sampling steps. It returns the double value (between 0 and 1) which represents the probability that the following (given) statement is true: P(events| conditions1, conditions0)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ILPException
        ParseException
        SQLException
        ReadOrWriteToFileException
        SolveException

      • setEvents0

        public void setEvents0(ArrayList<String> events0)
        P(events1, ! events0| conditions1, ! conditions0) The user can set events which he wants to be considered in the sampling. With this function negative events (which should not be true) will be set.
        Parameters:
        events1 -
